description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Place markers on the playfield to lead the ball towards the target, but watch out, since every marker you place will turn into a deadly obstacle!
description.short: Place markers on the playfield to lead the ball towards the target, but watch out, since every marker you place will turn into a deadly obstacle!
